changeSet.author: jhmoreno
changeSet.sql: SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[TipoAusentismo] ON GO INSERT [dbo].[TipoAusentismo] ([Id], [EstadoRegistro], [CreadoPor], [FechaCreacion], [ModificadoPor], [FechaModificacion], GO
changeSet.rollback: DELETE FROM [dbo].[TipoAusentismo] WHERE Id BETWEEN 1 AND 14;
